name: immunity
effect: This Pokémon cannot be poisoned. This includes bad poison. If a Pokémon is poisoned and acquires this ability, its poison is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.
flavor_text.platinum: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.
